resources.string:
Hi, my name is Ivo. 

I love snowboarding. 

The kind that is alive and surf top of the mountain pow. 
Fun fact is that I have several snowboards. 

I like computers, too. Gadgets. Technology. Retro. Hacking. 
And sometimes I go surfing. 
And even less times, I actually catch a wave. 

Once, when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caught a large salmon with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own bong.
